headline: Franklin Templeton readies money market funds for GENIUS Act, blockchain use
summary: Investing.com--Franklin Templeton (NYSE:BEN) said on Tuesday it has updated two institutional money market funds managed by its affiliate Western Asset Management to support two tokenized-finance use cases: stablecoin reserve management under the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for U.S. Stablecoins (GENIUS) Act and distribution through blockchain-enabled intermediaries.

content.title: Franklin Templeton readies money market funds for GENIUS Act, blockchain use
content.summary: Investing.com--Franklin Templeton (NYSE:BEN) said on Tuesday it has updated two institutional money market funds managed by its affiliate Western Asset Management to support two tokenized-finance use cases: stablecoin reserve management under the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for U.S. Stablecoins (GENIUS) Act and distribution through blockchain-enabled intermediaries.
